author: Karen Leigh / Bloomberg
title: President Trump and China’s Xi Pledge to Cooperate to Fight Coronavirus After Phone Call
description: President Donald Trump and China’s Xi Jinping pledged in a phone call to cooperate in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump and China’s Xi Jinping pledged in a phone call to cooperate in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic, signaling a fresh detente between the two countries after weeks of rising tensions.
“Just finished a very good conversation… [+2549 chars]
